Containers.Coast: The Coast smithing template can be found in Shipwrecks.
Containers.Dune: The Dune smithing template can be found in Desert Pyramids.
Containers.Eye: The Eye smithing template can be found in Strongholds.
Containers.Host: The Host smithing template can be found in Suspicious Gravel and Suspicious Sand.
Containers.Raiser: The Raiser smithing template can be found in Suspicious Gravel and Suspicious Sand.
Containers.Rib: The Rib smithing template can be found in Nether Fortresses.
Containers.Sentry: The Sentry smithing template can be found in chests in Pillager Outposts.
Containers.Shaper: The Shaper smithing template can be found in Suspicious Gravel and Suspicious Sand.
Containers.Silence: The Silence smithing template can be found in Ancient Cities.
Containers.Snout: The Snout smithing template can be found in Bastion Remnants.
Containers.Spire: The Spire smithing template can be found in End Cities.
Containers.Tide: The Tide smithing template has a 20% chance of being dropped upon killing an Elder Guardian.
Containers.Vex: The Vex smithing template can be found in Woodland Mansions.
Containers.Ward: The Ward smithing template can be found in Ancient Cities.
Containers.Wayfinder: The Wayfinder smithing template can be found in Suspicious Gravel and Suspicious Sand.
Containers.Wild: The Wild smithing template can be found in Jungle Temples.
